name: df-tx
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(ctx, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cfv(ctg, crn(cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s0), cv(s1), cxp(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))
bodyPretty: âŠ¢ tX =(s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦(topGen ` ran((s2 âˆˆ s0, s3 âˆˆ s1 â†¦(s2 Ã— s3)))))
comment: Define the binary topological product, which is homeomorphic to the general topological product over a two element set, but is more convenient to use. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
